title: Costa Rica: Citi Celebrates Two Centuries of Excellence with Its Corporate Clients at the Second Annual Conference on the Current Economy and Financial Solutions
summary: San José, Costa Rica - This year, Citi celebrates its 200th year at the forefront of excellence in financial services. To mark the anniversary, Citi Costa Rica held its second annual Conference on the Current Economy and Financial Solutions for corporate clients at the Real Intercontinental Hotel. More than 150 corporate clients and top-ranking experts from Citi attended the event.
tag-1: Costa Rica: Citi Celebrates Two Centuries of Excellence with Its Corporate Clients at the Second Annual Conference on the Current Economy and Financial Solutions
tag-3: San José, Costa Rica – This year, Citi celebrates its 200th year at the forefront of excellence in financial services. To mark the anniversary, Citi Costa Rica held its second annual Conference on the Current Economy and Financial Solutions for corporate clients at the Real Intercontinental Hotel. More than 150 corporate clients and top-ranking experts from Citi attended the event.
tag-4: "Citi has a long commitment to Costa Rica and has operated here since 1968," commented Gijs Veltman, CCO of Citi Costa Rica. "We have collaborated in the country's economic growth and development, drawing on our global network and experience to build a better future for our clients and the communities where we operate. This conference, coming in the context of our 200th anniversary, is our way of thinking our corporate clients and demonstrating our interest in this market."
tag-5: Citi was founded in 1812 as a trade finance bank to facilitate commerce between New York and Liverpool. Since then, the company has grown to become a leading provider of global financial services, with 200 million clients in more than 100 countries, 24 of them in Latin America. Operating at the center of global commerce and capital flows, Citi has facilitated some of the world's most transformative projects over the past two centuries, such as the transatlantic cable and the jumbo jet. With its unparalleled presence in emerging markets, the company is well positioned to contribute to economic growth and progress.
tag-6: "This year, the conference will focus on the topic of integrated risk management in an uncertain global environment such as the one we are experiencing today, where sound corporate financial management is critical regardless of the business sector," added Eduardo Oviedo, Managing Director and Country Treasurer at Citi Costa Rica. "We have prepared a highly specialized agenda with top presenters."
tag-7: Citi is celebrating its 200th anniversary in countries around the world this year. More than 20 events are planned for Latin America alone, demonstrating the company's solid presence in the region and its consistent support for economic progress and innovation.
tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
